title: fixing pnpm catalogs being removed from lockfile during update

body:
### What are you trying to accomplish?

Fix a bug where PNPM workspace catalogs were being removed from lockfiles during dependency updates. This happened because where were not referencing the `pnpm-workspace.yaml` file when running updates to the lockfiles.

### Anything you want to highlight for special attention from reviewers?

- Simplified how workspace content is passed to lockfile updater
- Removed unnecessary `is_catalog` flag
- Directly pass `@updated_pnpm_workspace_content` to maintain catalog entries

### How will you know you've accomplished your goal?

- PNPM lockfiles update catalog entries after updates
